Yeah, when I was drug into the room to listen to his speech, I was like "Oh=
, great, how spectacular!" but he actually really moved me. He caught me at=
tention and didn't let go of it. Impressive indeed!...

  ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
  From: RoboRick007 
  To: Neo Beast Wars RPG 
  Sent: Tuesday=
, September 11, 2001 9:51 PM
  Subject: Re: Terrorist bombs-Everyone read

=

  I would like to comment on the President's speech. It was great. This is=

  a great man, and a great President. He stated that the U.S. will hunt
  =
down those responsible, and bring them to jusice. And that these attacks
  =
cannot break the spirit of the land of the free. The fact that there
  will=
 be no distinction between the guilty, and those who protect them,
  is wha=
t I wanted to hear. I had said this from the start. If Afghanastan
  wants =
to protect those like Bin Ladden, then they desearve the same
  fate.


   =


  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/term=
s/
